Dim wfMap As Item = Me.getInnovator().getItemByKeyedName("Workflow Map","gAction Item") If wfMap.isError() Then Return wfMap Dim wfProcess As Item = Me.instantiateWorkflow(wfMap.getID()) If wfProcess.isError() Then Return wfProcess wfProcess.startWorkflow()
Dim plmIdentity As Aras.Server.Security.Identity = Aras.Server.Security.Identity.GetByName("Super User") Dim PermissionWasSet As Boolean = Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.GrantIdentity(plmIdentity)
Dim dtNow As DateTime = System.DateTime.UtcNow Dim tmpPtrn As String = "yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss" Dim tmpDt As String = dtNow.toString(tmpPtrn, DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo) Dim sCntxt As I18NSessionContext = Me.getInnovator().getI18NSessionContext() Dim myDate As String = sCntxt.ConvertUtcDateTimeToNeutral(tmpDt, tmpPtrn) Me.setProperty("action_item_start_date", myDate) Me.setAttribute("version","0") Me.setAttribute("serverEvents","0") Me.setAttribute("doGetItem", "0") Me.setAction("edit") Dim res As Item = Me.apply()
If (PermissionWasSet=True) Then Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.RevokeIdentity(plmIdentity) End If
Return Me
